113.content:
It was a very hot day. A surprisingly hot day for living in a place that always has snow. Either way, it made one red husky, Jenna, really thirsty.

"*pant* *pant* So...tired." Jenna said running out of breath. "Need...water."

113.title: Jenna's big thirst.

choices: Dusty inflates her belly with water like Jenna.

1133.content:
Jennas mouth felt so dry that she thought her tongue was a piece of sandpaper.

"I need something to drink." She thought. "Quick! If i dont find something soon, i will collapse..."

Then it hit Jenna like a stone on the head!

"I know where i can find some water!" She smiled. "The Winter-water storage!"

She started to run to the warehouse where the humans had some huge barrels with water for the cold times when the city was isolated for a longer time because no ship, plane, oder sledteam could get througt the ice and snow.

As Jenna entered the huge warehouse she thought she was in heaven.

"Oh my, those are really huge barrels." She smiled. "I was never here because it didnt bothered me, but now..."

She walked over to one of the gigantic barrels and tried to look up on it.
The barrels where over 5 meters in diameter and could hold nearly 150.000 liters each. (This is the size of the barrels: http://www.thelocal.de/userdata/images/a... )

Jenna looked at the valve on the barrel. It was perfect to drink from it so she didnt waste time and layed down beneath it.
The first little drop that was left in the short hose of the barrel tasted SO good, Jenna couldnt wait so get more.
She took the hose in her mouth and prepared to drink a few liters.
Her paw reached for the lever on the valve and she startet to push it open.
But nothing happened.
"Seems that the valve needs some more force to open..." Jenna thought as she pushed harder. "I think it wasnt opened for a few months."
She pushed and pushed but the lever didnt move.
"Come on!" Jenna thought. "I'm so thirsty i could drink the whole barrel! Open already!"

Then the valve finally opened!

But it opened more than Jenna wanted. Instead of opening just a bit, it opened all the way and a buge blast of water rushed into her mouth.
Jennas eyes widened as her cheeks bloated up and the water forced its way down her throat.
"Hmmmpf!" She mumbled. "Mmmmpf!"
The pressure in the barrel was so big that Jenna was forced to drink, and she knew there was no way she could stop.
She tried to reach for the lever on the valve but she was unable to close it from its actual position.
Then she felt a new pressure, and it was in her belly.
She looked down as best as she could and was shocked.
Her belly was inflating with water at a alarming rate!
She layed her paws on her growing belly and felt how it expanded to take the amount of water.
Jenna remembered how much water one of this barrels can hold.
"150.000 liters!" She thought. "I'm going to drink 150.000 liters of water!"

After the first shock, Jenna calmed down and thought about her situation. Her belly was still swelling and getting bigger and bigger. It already looked like a big beachball and pulsed with every gulp of water that Jenna swallowed wile growing 5 or 6 centimeter.
"Okay." Jenna thought. "I need to do something. But what? Call for help? Well, impossible with the hose in my mouth... Close the valve? Huh, if i could grab it, this could maybe work. Keep drinking? Hmm, maybe i should try to take the challenge..."
She closed her eyes for a momend, then opened them and looked at her already huge water filled belly that had just reaced 1.5 meters in diameter.
"Well, i have no choice." She thought. "If fate wants me to take the whole barrel, i will take it! Come on, fill me up!"
She started to suck on the hose, taking huge gulps of water and nearly pumping herself up.
Her belly swelled two times faster now getting bigger and bigger.
The new size of her belly forced Jenna to roll on her side and her belly sloshed and wobbled for a second as it hit the ground.
After she rolled to her side Jenna noticed that it was much easier to drink now and tried to drink faster.
Her belly grew and grew whitout any signs of stopping.
It grew to two meters, then thee, four, five, six and was close to seven as somethong happened. Something that surprised Jenna.
The flow of water from the hose stopped suddenly. Just a few drops were left.
Jenna was surprides and looked at the level indicator on the barrel.
Her eyes widened and she spit the hose out.
"The barrel is empy!" She panted and burped suddenly. "I took the whole barrel!"
She looked at her gigantic water inflated belly and put a paw on it.
"Well, i guess i will not be thirsty anymore for a long time." She giggled and burped again. "Oh my, i'm burping like Balto." She grinned.

Because of her huge inflated belly Jenna was forced to stay where she was. And because she didnt have anything else to do she decided to take a little nap.

A hour later Jenna waked up because she felt something on her belly.
It was a paw poking on it. Then a cold nose.
Jenna groaned. "Whoever is poking on my belly, stop it!"
"Mom?" Was the answer and Jenna froze. "Is that you?"
"Kodi?" Jenna asked.
Kodi walked around her huge belly. "Yes Mom." He answered.
"What are you doing here?" Jenna asked her son.
"Well, we looked for something to drink." Kodi answered.
"We?" Jenna asked.
"Yeah, Dusty and me." Kodi answered.
Now Dusty appered behind Jennas belly.
"Hi Jenna." She smiled.
Jenna blushed extremly. It was a little embarassing for her that Kodi and especially Dusty saw her like this.
"It seems we had the same idea." Kodi smiled looking at his mothers belly.
Jenna laughed. "Well i got a bit carried away because that stupid valve was jammed."
"Did you really take the whole barrel Jenna?" Dusty asked.
"I think so." Jenna answered. "At least the barrel is empty now, but i dont know if it was completly full."
"Well. guessing on your size..." Kodi said and poked her belly. "It was full."
"Kodi, dont poke her." Dusty said. "You dont know if she can pop."
"Dont worry Dusty." Jenna smiled. "I wont pop from that little poking."
Kodi grinned.
"And whats about a big hug?" He smiled, jumped forward and hugged his mothers huge belly.
"Ooooof!" Jenna gasped as her son squeezed her belly.
"Kodi!" Dusty gasped. "Dont tell me you like it when your mother is so..." She stopped abruptly avoiding to say "so fat". She looked to Jenna. "So big."
Kodi smiled as he let go of his mothers belly.
"Well girls." He started. "To be honest: I absolutely LOVE huge bellies!"
Jenna and Dusty gasped.
"Are you kidding me?" Jenna asked.
"So thats the reason why you try to stuff me like a turkey when where out ond a date." Dusty said. "You want me to get round!"
"Yeah, i know." Kodi admitted. "I'm a perv."
Dusty laughed and Jenna too.
"You know what Kodi?" Jenna started.
"Thats why we love you." Dusty ended. "And if you like big bellies, then i will get a big belly for you."
